original_text: And he enquired of the Lord for him, and gave him victuals, and gave him the sword of Goliath the Philistine.
korean_text: 아히멜렉이 그를 위하여 여호와께 묻고 그에게 음식도 주고 블레셋 사람 골리앗의 칼도 주더이다

sentences.original_text: And he enquired of the Lord for him
and gave him the sword of Goliath the Philistine
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람 골리앗의 검을 그에게 주었다
